ApplicationData.text: Brought to you by The JMMC Team.

package.name: TOPCAT
package.description: This software uses the VO table browser which is one of the starlink projects.

prerelease.change: Enhance error message displayed that occures on yorick side
Propose on parameters view that group every parameter of one composed model
Add sniffer capability
Use checkboxes to file selection instead of the simple list widget
Permit user to select installed programs as fits viewer
Add document modified flag into the whole code . That is really important because work can be lost after load or new menu request
Display a progress bar during long actions( user sometimes click several times on buttons because nothing seems running...)
User would like to plot uv map of model for multiple targets (actually only first one is returned)
Fix parameter name conflict when one new target is added to an old setting file
User can load a setting from URL or pre loaded demo ones
Window closing button now quits application
User can plot image of model for multiple targets
Normalization of residual can be adjusted in 'Target panel' (default value is true)
File Browser are open into user home directory on mac OS X
Fix bug of non solicited target ident changes during model construction
Fix right click support on windows platform view bug description
Do not close application on preference window closing event
Second level support of radial plots (T3 and VIS2 appears on same plot)
Textarea of result panel is not editable anymore
First level support of radial plots (T3 do not yet work)
Show description of models in the Model Panel.Description is returned by getModelList script that extracts yorick informations through hashtable
Right click on parameters is direct (no more selection need before click)
Removed limitation of param sharing based one same typeUser MUST take care of what he tries...
Fix paramater sharing
Fix save bug
A dialog box is displayed when error occured on yorick side
Show most of informations about fitting process into result panel
Result panel starts to plot yoga results (baselines,uvcoverage,model image,model uv map)
Do not return error not enough data point anymore due to blank names into oitarget names
A simple image viewer has been implemented with 3 selectable color models. Image should be in right sense and get correct values.
Velocity of result display has been improved
Parameter display has been fixed concerning exchanged values
Handle better oitargets name even if new fits library places some spaces into oitarget names
Use advanced menu to group interop menu and logging utility
Show covariance matrix into result panel
Fitting results are taken into account for parameters values
Models can share parameters
Fits files with zero length column supported
Fits viewer do not close anymore main application while quitting fits viewer
UV Coverage plot and interferometer sketch are automated at one basic level
Select by default oifiles associated to the added target
Display more info on observed data files
Make possible to use xml model without embedded b64 files. If the file is not found during opening, a dialog asks to locate it.
Quit action checks that every document have been saved
Display the release panel
Saving file does not use openDialog anymore but saveDialog instead
Fits file viewers can show selected tables with topcat defaut viewer
Embedded data extracted one time for every actions(viewing,saving...)
FilePanel permits to save embedded file
Delete button used to supress target refreshes the left tree
Preference window close button does not quit the application anylonger
Double clicks into list select view on clicked element
Settings splits sub components grouping FilesPanel and TargetsPanel
Report error loading bad format files (oifiles and settings ones)
